channel.title: Im very noob , very easy question fr ya plx help
channel.description: Well , i just started do develop rs2 private servers , 1 very noobish question:how can i change .java files to class files?I changed something in client.java file to see it in game i need class file , help...

item.title: Im very noob , very easy question fr ya plx help
item.dc:creator: @SirEddie SirEddie
item.description:
@SirEddie wrote:

ok ill make this very easy
Make a folder in your C Drive and call it Client
Put Your client.java file in this folder
Then, Open up a command box by doing
Start->Run->cmd
then in the Command Box type
cd C:\Client
Then press enter
Now it should change you command line to C:\Client
now type javac client.java
wait a few seconds and a new command line should come up as if nothing has happend
Now you will have a client.java and client.class file in your C:\Client folder
Now move both these back into your server source folder
And run your server

Oh Yeh by the way it wont make a class if there is ANY errors so if it brings up errors you need to fix them b4 you can do it

Read full topic
